snippet.title: Anna Extended Edition Trailer
snippet.description:
Check out the official trailer for the Extended Edition of Anna, the psychological horror game ! Join us on Facebook http://FB.com/GameNewsOfficial & http://twitter.com/gamenewstrailer. Set in an abandoned sawmill nestled high in the Italian mountains, Anna challenges the player to uncover horrific clues and use them to solve puzzles related to the main character's dark past.

Anna Extended Edition Trailer (HD). The game is now available for PC, Mac and on Steam ! Subscribe now to get the latest game trailer, gameplay teaser & cinematic video, videogame walkthrough and ingame videos with Game News Official (GameNews) ! Anna Trailer.
